trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemCommand" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs> object to modify the status of tasks in a list when the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>物件以修改清單中的工作的狀態，當按一下項目。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>概觀。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs" /> class using the provided <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem" />，初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The `item` and `commandSource` parameters initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> properties with their respective values.
trans-unit.target: `item`和`commandSource`參數初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>屬性及其各自的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The original arguments inherited from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 原始的引數是繼承自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs" /> class using the given <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource" />, and the original command arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem" /> 和原始命令引數，初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: This constructor builds a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式建置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `item` and `commandSource` parameters initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> properties with their respective values.
trans-unit.target: `item`和`commandSource`參數初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.ListItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>屬性及其各自的值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor includes an `originalArgs` parameter; this form of the constructor allows you to pass in a set of command arguments through the `originalArgs` parameter, which is useful for handling bubbled events.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式包括`originalArgs`參數; 此表單的建構函式可讓您將透過命令列引數的一組`originalArgs`參數，可用於處理事件反昇。

trans-unit.source: Returns the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 傳回引發事件的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the name of the default command.
trans-unit.target: 設定或傳回預設命令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: When set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> attempts to render a shortcut to invoke the default command.
trans-unit.target: 設定時，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>嘗試呈現叫用的預設命令的捷徑。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the default rendering in `ListView` displays the first field as a link to the `DetailsView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，預設在轉譯`ListView`的連結以顯示第一個欄位`DetailsView`的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property, clicking the link invokes the default command.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>屬性中，按一下連結會叫用的預設命令。

trans-unit.source: Invoking the default command raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 叫用的預設命令引發<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> object is set to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.DefaultCommand> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>物件設定的值為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListCommandEventArgs.DefaultCommand>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Even if a default command is defined, you should include a command with the same name in the commands collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使定義預設的命令，您應該具有相同名稱的命令集合中包含的命令。

trans-unit.source: If the control cannot render a graphical element that includes a shortcut for the default command, the default command is still available by rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: 控制項無法呈現圖形元素包含預設命令的捷徑的預設命令是否仍然可用轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to the use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property to specify "Check" as the default command.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>屬性來指定 「 檢查 」 做為預設命令。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 傳回產生事件的清單項目。

trans-unit.source: The list item that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 產生事件的清單項目。
